ygData.subject: RE: Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
ygData.msgSnippet: No....I never dueled him.  I did more damage with a sword and discord than the wizard did with his spells.  It pissed him off so he tried to duel me.
ygData.messageBody:
No....I never dueled him. I did more damage with a sword and discord than
the wizard did with his spells. It pissed him off so he tried to duel me.


> ----------
> From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)[SMTP:kblair@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 2:57 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Magical Gloves? (Added: Bard Revenge?)
>
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > At level 7 playing my chords of dissonance and whacking on a
> > gnoll a wizard a level higher than me tried to steal my kill
> > but couldn't do it :) He got mad because my 'chords' were
> > casting a spell on him. He tried to duel me - I just ignored
> > him.
>
> So if Chords is hitting a spellcaster - they can't cast any spells?
